APPLAUSE (AIP) DR4.columns: source_id, scan_id, plate_id, ra_icrs, dec_icrs, natmag, natmag_error, bpmag, rpmag

Bochum.columns: band_name, obs_id, ra, dec, mean_mag, amp, nobs

HELP_Spectra.columns: field, ra, dec, z_spec, z_source, z_qual, notes

HELP.columns: field, help_id, ra, dec, ebv, redshift, stellarity, m_best_u, m_best_g, m_best_r, m_best_i, m_best_z, m_best_y, m_best_j, m_best_h, m_best_ks

HSCv3.columns: SourceID, MatchID, MatchRA as ra, MatchDec as dec, Filter, MagAuto, MagAper2, Flags

J-PLUS-DR3.columns: Obj.alpha_j2000, Obj.delta_j2000, Obj.mag_auto, Obj.mag_err_auto, Obj.class_star, Obj.flags, Obj.mask_flags, lephare.*
